text: British thermal unit, abbreviated as BTU, is a unit of energy measurement. The unit sees use in the United Kingdom, United States and Canada for particularly purposes, such as natural gas pricing. ==Related pages== *Joule *Power *Calorie *Electricity *Kinematics *Horsepower *Thermodynamics *Classical mechanics *Quantum mechanics *Specific heat capacity Category:Imperial units Category:Units of energy
title: British thermal unit
